segments.text: Of course ! Of course ! Here you are . Thank you so much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you looking for anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Um , let me see . Hmm . This antique tea set here is gorgeous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That was a thirtieth birthday present . You can have it if you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? No , no , I couldn't ! You're too nice !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And these old Dutch candle holders would go nicely with the tea set . Have them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Gee ! I don't know what to say ! Thanks so much .
segments.speaker: S1
